thread.title: This Throwback Picture Of Madhuri Dixit Nene And Shah Rukh Khan Is Giving Us All The Feels
thread.title_full: This Throwback Picture Of Madhuri Dixit Nene And Shah Rukh Khan Is Giving Us All The Feels

title: This Throwback Picture Of Madhuri Dixit Nene And Shah Rukh Khan Is Giving Us All The Feels
text:
facebook 169 SHARES 
Madhuri Dixit Nene is currently on a throwback spree, on her social media accounts, and if you want some 90s nostalgia, that's where you need to be. The dhak dhak girl has been sharing everything, from movie stills to old photo shoots, and, frankly, we are loving the insight into the dancing diva's life through the years. 
Yesterday, she shared this picture from Hum Tumhare Hain Sanam , in which she starred opposite Shah Rukh Khan and captioned it, "A girl can get swept off her feet, even in the movies." We get it, Ms. Dixit. We totally do!! A post shared by Madhuri Dixit (@madhuridixitnene) on Mar 8, 2017 at 9:56pm PST 
And while we are at it, here's a bunch of the other #Throwback pictures that Madhuri's been sharing with the world. This cute moment from Dil To Pagal Hai A post shared by Madhuri Dixit (@madhuridixitnene) on Mar 6, 2017 at 9:30pm PST This kick-ass action scene from Gulaab Gang A post shared by Madhuri Dixit (@madhuridixitnene) on Mar 5, 2017 at 10:12pm PST Here's the diva grooving to Maar Dala A post shared by Madhuri Dixit (@madhuridixitnene) on Mar 2, 2017 at 4:30am PST The beautiful Chandramukhi A post shared by Madhuri Dixit (@madhuridixitnene) on Feb 22, 2017 at 9:31pm PST The winning team #DTPH A post shared by Madhuri Dixit (@madhuridixitnene) on Feb 13, 2017 at 3:06am PST Photo credits: Instagram
